name: Worhol
description:
A game of explosive catharsis in an art museum. Break everything!

GitHub link to game: https://github.com/GDFauxtrot/AwesomePerSecond

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to look (+ scroll wheel to zoom in/out)

Spacebar to jump

Left Shift to destroy objects when in midair

DirectInput controller supported! (A to jump, X to smash, joysticks to look & move)
